name: Organizing Natural Lifeforms Yields Nasty Experiments
name_original: Organizing Natural Lifeforms Yields Nasty Experiments
description:
As Xenobiologist Undersecretary, your job is to observe and sort the many species contained in the confines of the Quantum Terraria. The optimal outcome of your sorting process would contain only one species in each Terrarium.

Made in a weekend for GMTK Jam 2019 by first-time jammers Mart McMahon, James Robert, Tara Robert, Lena Wright and Max Shell. Music (used with permission): "Ria" by Ichiro Nakagawa.
